Hi @pkwenda 
Do you mean datasource name `msg-center` can not work, but `msg_center` works well?

If the real database name of the configuration file has an underscore, it is processed by an alias, for example, like this

```yaml
shardingsphere:
        datasource:
            msg-center:
                driver-class-name: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
                jdbc-url: jdbc:mysql://**.**.**.**:3306/msg_center
                password: ***
                type: com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource
                username: ***
            names: msg-center
```
